MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY11 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Weston Lane and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30Pm via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:30PM on 31st January 2021
